lines.text: Dude! I think I figured it out!
Eh? What’s got you all excited?
That level two spell! A Stop Wizard can cast Flesh to Stone, but that spell can backfire!
If it backfires, the wizard who cast it gets turned to stone themselves! Which means…
That statue isn’t just a statue- it used to be a real <c=#0000FF>Stop Wizard!</c>
That’s a pretty wild theory, but…
I mean, how else would we explain that thing?
I guess this means that <c=#FF00FF>that statue used to be a Stop Wizard,</c> and he tried to pull something during the incident.
We know there had to be one here anyway, since someone cast Living Memory.
...kinda shaky, honestly, but let’s work with that assumption for now.
We might be wrong, but we’ll get it right eventually if we keep finding clues.
